title: Alt tab in champion select
body: Please make it so I can alt tab in champ select, and that the screen pops up when I have to pick a champion or something like that, because I continuously keep dodging... I hate it so much. This is honestly so annoying, worst addition, or rather removal to league.

replies.body: Can you not just stay in the Champ Select? I mean, seriously, how hard can that be lol?
it already does so during the accept/decline option. just stay on the damn screen or go back in when you hear the louder sound effect. how lazy can you get
